sentence.Network_en: In fact, it is a combination of anastomat and rectal speculum.
sentence.Network_cn: 它实际上是直肠镜与吻合器的一种结合物.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Cervical diseases can be diagnosed by vaginal speculum and then give exact and pristine treatment.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论通过阴道镜检查可对宫颈疾病做出明确诊断,以便给予正确的、早期的治疗.

sentence.Network_en: An instrument consisting of a tube or speculum equipped with a light, used to examine rectum.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin, literally mirror', from specere 'to look'

means.word_mean: 1. a mirror (especially one made of polished metal) for use in an optical instrument
2. a medical instrument for dilating a bodily passage or cavity in order to examine the interior

auth_sentence.content: The doctor or nurse will insert an instrument called a speculum into the vagina to allow them to see the cervix.
